simblocity

simblocity: rapid fire match 3

You've got 63 seconds to match the colored blocks - the smarter you match, the better you score!

* Fast, fun and addictive match 3 game!
* A test for your reactions and matching skills!
* Match quick and build up your multipliers!
* Boost your score with cascades and combos!
* Create and combine special blocks and score huge bonuses!
* Compete with your friends on our Gamecenter and Facebook leaderboards
Can you get over a million? Download simblocity and take up the challenge!
